channel.title: [Slight force vote mechanic rework]
channel.description:
Hi there, I'd just like to suggest a small rework to the force vote mechanic that is on the Noble and Possessor right now.
I'd suggest **force voting/mind control be available at daystart** like the reaper's chill. It is a mechanic I believe is meant to enable classes with this ability to have a distinct end-game advantage that is equal if not better to the kings. Please enable this ability to be used at daystart so that it doesn't become a vote race similar to the old reaper chill/ vote him before he can chill you situation.
Feedback appreciated
Marcus

We can always solve this by allowing voting during the first seconds but not allowing trials to happen till a certain time is reached.

Reaper will then cancel someone’s vote with chill, so it isn’t a race.
